dc:title: Another Miracle, Please, St. Joseph!
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: After cataloging the "little miracles" of gifts that arrive just in time--blankets, food, clothes, offer of a moose--she asks for bill money. She rejects business approaches to fund raising and says their method comes from the gospel and the "importunity" suggested. They trust they will receive.
